abstract: Hillary Clinton suggests her administration would include role for her husband, former Pres Bill Clinton, who would be tasked with revitalizing economy; practicalities of integrating her spouse into cabinet already staffed with economic experts raise questions; touting of former president's economic legacy offers stark contrast to Donald J Trump's populist protectionism.
lead_paragraph: Remarks that her husband would focus on economic growth in a Hillary Clinton administration are raising questions about how such an arrangement would work.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Shapes Potential New Role for Bill Clinton
headline.print_headline: Clinton Shapes Potential New Role for Her Husband

snippet: Remarks that her husband would focus on economic growth in a Hillary Clinton administration are raising questions about how such an arrangement would work.
